name: Get your steppin' on son
description:
Write a function that takes in a string and creates a step with that word.

E.g:

```python
# Input
"SNAKES SHOE EFFORT TRUMP POTATO"

# Should return
[['S','N','A','K','E','S',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','H',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','O',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','E','F','F','O','R','T',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','R',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','U',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','M',' ',' ',' ',' ',' '],
 [' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ',' ','P','O','T','A','T','O']]

```
Every word will end with the character that the next word will start with.

You will start top left of the array and end at the bottom right. 

All cells that are not occupied by a letter needs to be a space ```' '```
